Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 2006-07 Household Member Recode Data

Source: R/PKPR53.R
PKPR53.Rd

PKPR53 data of Household Member Recode from Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 2006-07.

case identification

hvidx

line number
